entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot create layout on unknown arch Loongarch #78854
    Future
  • Mono iOS disk size regression #78851
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: GetFunctionPointer for delegates #78846
  • [API Proposal]: String should implement IParsable<string> #78842

Closed

  • ExecutionEngineException when hooking/detouring GetSysColor() #78086
  • [NativeAOT] System.Numerics.Vectors test fails to compile with an assert. #78717
    8.0.0
  • Strange behavior between Release and Debug builds [Random access violations and null exceptions] #78839
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException thrown for System.Text.Json with default buffer size #78856
  • Serialization of properties from inherited interfaces vs abstract base classes #41749
    8.0.0
  • Should `IDictionary<K, V>` return something that implements `IReadOnlySet<K>`? #78762
  • File Operation in Ubuntu 22.04 #76572
    Future
  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe is not obey .NET Standard 2.0 (it should support .NET Core 2.1 App) #77367
    Future
  • Multi-targeting logic in Source Generators in NuGet packages doesn't work transitively #60870
    6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Could not load file or assembly System.Text.Json Version=7.0.0.0,or one of its dependencies. The located assembly's manifest definition does not match the assembly reference. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80131040) #77988
  • Release-only build has errors due to ResolvedMatchingContract when re-compiling in Visual Studio #75897
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json serialization fails in .Net Framework for objects with a specify constructor #78844

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not overallocate SocketAddress.Buffer #78860
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add .NET 7 source gen regression tests #78857
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] This fixes Github issue 78206 - a heap corruption problem associated with mark stack overflow #78855
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][draft] make JSObject dynamic #78853
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [Android] Remove repeated calls to beginHandshake #78849
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [wasm][mt] making JSImport work on worker thread #78847
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Fix asserts in Vector<> #78765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove SystemReflectionMetadataLoadContextVersion from Versions.prop #78848
  • Move the `[With|Get]Element(SIMD)` folding to local morph #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • This fixes Github issue 78206 - a heap corruption problem associated with mark stack overflow #78756
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update convention on how to ref and pack analyzers #78845
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add support for serializing properties in interface hierarchies #78788
    enhancement, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Make DependencyGraphViewer a WinExe #78843
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Disable CG on Linux musl installer jobs too #78832
  • [mono][tests] Fix FullAOT DivToMul test #78816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • JIT: Fold const RVA access (via const index) #78783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2053331 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • CoreCLR initialization failures logging #78790
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • ci test #76081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add a managed cache for flags in RuntimeType. #78840
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Fix ds-ipc-pal-socket.c Windows build. #77840
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Update a few dependencies #78710
  • [Android] Prevent exceptions with a 'Success' message in System.Net.NetworkInformation #78555
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • JIT: Set GTF_ORDER_SIDEEFF for some nodes with invisible dependencies #78698
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] propagate aborted startup to top most promise #78764
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.2
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 3 #78782
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Enable basic Kept validation in NativeAOT running linker tests #78828
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Switch to the new ARM64 Helix queues #77764
    area-Infrastructure
  • [corlib] Move System.Reflection.Emit.SignatureHelper to the shared partition #77939
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix Runtime_76194 test #78760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make sure s_currentGenerationTable is safe for profiler attach #78841
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
